short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension to assist with managing posters in Plex

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Plex Poster Assistant lets you update poster art within your Plex library while browsing in Chrome. It will check the page for poster art in addition to accepting user-inputted image URLs
